video:video.video:title: Acer Chromebook 311 (CB311-12H / CB311-12HT) Video Review
video:video.video:description: The Acer Chromebook 311 suits its purpose as a basic device well, particularly for educational and casual tasks.

video:video.video:title: Acer Chromebook Spin 513 Video Review
video:video.video:description: The Acer Chromebook Spin 513 is a 13.3-inch convertible laptop that has caught the attention of many tech enthusiasts.

video:video.video:title: ASUS Chromebook Plus CX34 CX3402CBA Video Demo and Review
video:video.video:description: The ASUS Chromebook Plus CX34 is a 14-inch laptop that aims to deliver solid performance without breaking the bank. This review breaks down its key features.

video:video.video:title: Review of the Lenovo Flex 3i Chromebook 82T3000LUK
video:video.video:description: The video is a review of the Lenovo Flex 3i Chromebook, a 15.6-inch convertible laptop. The reviewer highlights its large screen, versatility, and affordability.

video:video.video:title: ASUS CX1500CKA Chromebook Review
video:video.video:description: Review of the ASUS CX1500CKA Chromebook: Pros, cons, and performance insights for budget-conscious users.

video:video.video:title: Unboxing and Initial Review of the 2024 Acer Chromebook 311
video:video.video:description: Unboxing the 2024 Acer Chromebook 311: Lightweight, eco-friendly, good for students and budget-conscious users.

video:video.video:title: Samsung Chromebook Plus Demo at CES 2017
video:video.video:description: This video is a quick hands on the Samsung Chromebook Plus by Robby Payne of Chrome Unboxed at CES 2017.

video:video.video:title: Toshiba CB35-C3350 Chromebook 2 Review
video:video.video:description: A video review of the Toshiba CB35-C3350 Chromebook 2 released in September 2015 by Robby Payne of Chrome Unboxed.

video:video.video:title: Toshiba CB35-C3300 Chromebook 2 Review
video:video.video:description: A 5-minute video review of the Toshiba CB35-C3300 Chromebook released in September 2015.

video:video.video:title: ASUS Chromebook C201 Review by Chrome Unboxed
video:video.video:description: A video review of the 4 GB ASUS Chromebook C201 (C201PA-DS02) by Robby Payne of Chrome Unboxed.

video:video.video:title: ASUS Chromebook Flip Review by Chrome Unboxed
video:video.video:description: A video review of the 4 GB ASUS Chromebook Flip (C100PA-DB02) by Robby Payne of Chrome Unboxed.

video:video.video:title: Acer Chromebook 15 C910-54M1 Review
video:video.video:description: A quick review by Robby Payne of the Acer Chromebook 15 C910-54M1, which is powered by an Intel core i5 processor.

video:video.video:title: Chomebook Pixel vs Macbook Pro - 2015 Models Compared
video:video.video:description: This video by Waj Syed from MW Technology compares the Chromebook Pixel 2 with the latest version of the MacBook Pro.

video:video.video:title: Unboxing and Review of the Chromebook Pixel 2 LS
video:video.video:description: This video by DetroitBORG gives you some good impressions of the new Chromebook Pixel LS from unboxing to naming the hardware components, comparing it with the predecessor, and demonstrating the software.

video:video.video:title: Acer Chromebook 15 C910-C37P Unboxing
video:video.video:description: This is a short video of Robby Payne unboxing one of the latest Chromebooks out there, the Acer Chromebook 15 C910-C37P.

video:video.video:title: Toshiba CB35-B3340 Chromebook 2 Chrome Unboxed Review
video:video.video:description: A video review of the Toshiba CB35-B3340 Chromebook 2 by Robby Payne of Chrome Unboxed.

video:video.video:title: Crouton Explained on an HP Chromebook 11
video:video.video:description: In episode 1721 of hak5 host Darren explains what Crouton is, what chrooted environment means and how you can run Linux on a Chromebook.

video:video.video:title: More Details on the new Acer Chromebook 15 Models
video:video.video:description: This interview from Lon Seidman with an Acer representative provides some more detail on the upcoming Acer Chromebook 15, that is being showcased at CES 2015.

video:video.video:title: Steam In-Home Streaming Demoed on a Toshiba Chromebook 2
video:video.video:description: This video demonstrates game play on a Toshiba Chromebook 2 running Xubuntu via Crouton using the Steam In-Home Streaming technology.

video:video.video:title: Acer Chromebook 15 Introduced at CES 2015
video:video.video:description: Acer showcased this new Chromebook at CES 2015, which currently takes place in Las Vegas: the Acer Chromebook 15.

video:video.video:title: First Impressions of the Toshiba CB35-B3340 Chromebook 2
video:video.video:description: Unboxing and first impressions of the Toshiba CB35-B3340 Chromebook 2 by Chrome Unboxed.

video:video.video:title: Toshiba CB35-B3340 Chromebook 2 Review
video:video.video:description: A long video review of the high-specced Toshiba CB35-B3340 Chromebook 2 concluding that this is the best Chromebook released so far.

video:video.video:title: Hands-on the Tegra K1 powered HP Chromebook 14 at IFA 2014
video:video.video:description: A short hands-on video of the upcoming Tegra K1 powered HP Chromebook 14 recored by Steve Paine at IFA 2014.

video:video.video:title: Hands-on the Toshiba Chromebook 2 at IFA 2014
video:video.video:description: There are 2 main criticisms of Chromebooks in terms of hardware: too little RAM and low quality displays. An upcoming Chromebook that could fill this gap is the Toshiba Chromebook 2 CB30-B.

video:video.video:title: Danny Stieben Reviews the Toshiba CB35 A3120 Chromebook
video:video.video:description: A video review of the Toshiba CB35 A3120 Chromebook done by Danny Stieben of makeuseof, who recommends to look for another 13.3 inch Chromebook instead.

video:video.video:title: Kevin Purcell Reviews the Lenovo Thinkpad Yoga 11e Chromebook
video:video.video:description: A review of the Lenovo Thinkpad Yoga 11e Chromebook done by Kevin Purcell who evaluates it as the best Chromebook option for people who need a very durable device.

video:video.video:title: Robby Payne Reviews the ASUS C300 Chromebook
video:video.video:description: In this video Robby Payne of Chrome Unboxed reviews the ASUS C300, one of the first Chromebooks powered by an Intel Bay Trail processor.

video:video.video:title: Leo Laporte Reviews the Lenovo N20p Chromebook
video:video.video:description: In episode 136 of Before You Buy Leo Laporte reviewed the Lenovo N20p Chromebook. While Leo generally admires Chromebooks and Chrome OS, he is not particularly fond of this device.

video:video.video:title: ASUS Chromebook C300 Unboxing and Hands-On
video:video.video:description: In this video Robby Payne of Chrome Unboxed gets his hands on the new 13.3-inch ASUS C300 Chromebook.

video:video.video:title: Samsung Chromebook 2 Unboxing and Hands-On

video:video.video:title: Play Doom and Quake on a Chromebook when Offline

video:video.video:title: Q and A about the Samsung Chromebook 2
video:video.video:description: The Samsung Product Support TV introduces Chrome OS and answers questions about the Samsung Chromebook 2.

video:video.video:title: HP Chromebook 11 Compared to Acer C720
video:video.video:description: This video presents a side-by-side comparison of the HP Chromebook 11 and the Acer C720.

video:video.video:title: Quick Look at the Lenovo ThinkPad 11e Chromebook
video:video.video:description: This video gives first impressions of the upcoming Lenovo ThinkPad 11e Chromebook, which will be available as a clamshell-style notebook and as a Yoga-style convertible.

video:video.video:title: Is a Chromebook Good for Students?

video:video.video:title: HP Chromebook 14 Compared to HP Chromebook 11

video:video.video:title: Extensive Review of the HP Chromebook 11
